This is an "addon" for SLTriggers Redux, the Consumption Lifestyle.

Requirements:
- SL Triggers Redux
    - to run the scripts
- Transformative Elixirs
    - for the elixirs

What it contains

SKSE/Plugins/sl_triggers/commands/ConsumptionLifestyle.sltscript
- when run, looks for any of the non-stealth transformative elixirs in the player's inventory and consumes all that are found

SKSE/Plugins/sl_triggers/extensions/sl_triggersExtensionCore/ConsumptionLifestyle.json
- Timer trigger, 1 minute delay
- Comes preconfigured and ready to run
